statements: SELECT * FROM employee_engagement_survey_responses;
SELECT employee_id, engagement_score FROM employee_engagement_survey_responses WHERE survey_date = '2022-01-01';
SELECT DISTINCT survey_id FROM employee_engagement_survey_responses WHERE engagement_score > 80;
SELECT survey_id, employee_id, engagement_score FROM employee_engagement_survey_responses WHERE engagement_score BETWEEN 70 AND 90 ORDER BY survey_date DESC;
SELECT survey_id, AVG(engagement_score) AS avg_score FROM employee_engagement_survey_responses GROUP BY survey_id HAVING avg_score > 75 ORDER BY avg_score DESC;
SELECT employee_id, engagement_score FROM employee_engagement_survey_responses WHERE engagement_score > 80 ORDER BY survey_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM employee_engagement_survey_responses WHERE survey_date >= '2022-01-01' AND survey_date <= '2022-06-30';
SELECT survey_id, survey_date, engagement_score FROM employee_engagement_survey_responses WHERE engagement_score < 50 ORDER BY survey_id ASC;
SELECT COUNT(employee_id) AS total_responses, AVG(engagement_score) AS avg_score FROM employee_engagement_survey_responses;
SELECT survey_id, employee_id, engagement_score, survey_date FROM employee_engagement_survey_responses ORDER BY engagement_score DESC, survey_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM employees WHERE department = 'Marketing';
SELECT employee_name, position FROM employees WHERE hire_date < '2022-01-01';
SELECT employee_name, department FROM employees ORDER BY department DESC;
SELECT * FROM survey_responses WHERE engagement_score > 80;
SELECT employee_name, hire_date FROM employees WHERE position = 'Manager';
SELECT * FROM survey_responses WHERE engagement_score > 80 ORDER BY survey_date DESC;
SELECT employee_name, department FROM employees WHERE hire_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT employee_id, survey_date FROM survey_responses WHERE engagement_score < 50 GROUP BY survey_date ORDER BY survey_date ASC;
SELECT employee_name, department FROM employees JOIN survey_responses ON employees.employee_id = survey_responses.employee_id WHERE survey_responses.engagement_score < 70;
SELECT MAX(engagement_score) AS max_score, MIN(engagement_score) AS min_score FROM survey_responses;
SELECT * FROM survey_responses;
SELECT survey_id, employee_id, response FROM survey_responses ORDER BY survey_id DESC;
SELECT first_name, last_name, department FROM employees WHERE department = 'Sales';
SELECT survey_name, survey_date FROM surveys WHERE survey_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT employee_id, COUNT(*) AS response_count FROM survey_responses GROUP BY employee_id ORDER BY response_count DESC;
SELECT * FROM survey_responses WHERE survey_id = 1
SELECT employee_id, first_name, last_name, department FROM employees WHERE department = 'HR'
SELECT survey_name, survey_date FROM surveys ORDER BY survey_date DESC
SELECT employee_id, first_name, last_name, email FROM employees WHERE first_name LIKE 'J%'
SELECT response, submission_date FROM survey_responses WHERE submission_date >= '2021-01-01'
SELECT * FROM Employee;
SELECT name, department, hire_date FROM Employee WHERE department = 'IT';
SELECT employee_id, name, email FROM Employee ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT * FROM Survey WHERE survey_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT question1, question3, question5 FROM Survey INNER JOIN Response ON Survey.survey_id = Response.survey_id WHERE Response.question1_answer = 1;
SELECT name, email, department FROM Employee WHERE position = 'Manager';
SELECT * FROM Survey WHERE survey_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT e.name, s.survey_date, r.question1_answer FROM Employee e JOIN Survey s ON e.employee_id = s.employee_id JOIN Response r ON s.survey_id = r.survey_id WHERE e.department = 'Sales';
SELECT f.feedback_text, r.question2_answer FROM Feedback f JOIN Response r ON f.response_id = r.response_id WHERE r.question1_answer = 5;
SELECT MAX(question3_answer) AS max_answer, MIN(question3_answer) AS min_answer FROM Response;
SELECT * FROM EmployeeInfo;
SELECT full_name, position FROM EmployeeInfo WHERE department = 'Marketing';
SELECT department, COUNT(*) AS total_employees FROM EmployeeInfo GROUP BY department;
SELECT * FROM SurveyResponses WHERE engagement_score > 80 ORDER BY survey_date DESC;
SELECT employee_id, SUM(hours_worked) AS total_hours_worked FROM RemoteWorkStats GROUP BY employee_id HAVING total_hours_worked > 40;
SELECT * FROM EmployeeInfo;
SELECT full_name, department FROM EmployeeInfo WHERE hire_date >= '2021-01-01' ORDER BY full_name DESC;
SELECT employee_id, position, hire_date FROM EmployeeInfo WHERE department = 'Engineering' AND position = 'Senior Developer';
SELECT er.employee_id, er.full_name, sr.survey_date, sr.engagement_score FROM EmployeeInfo er INNER JOIN SurveyResponses sr ON er.employee_id = sr.employee_id WHERE sr.engagement_score > 75;
SELECT df.department, df.feedback_text, df.feedback_date, ei.full_name FROM DepartmentFeedback df LEFT JOIN EmployeeInfo ei ON df.department = ei.department ORDER BY df.feedback_date DESC;
